DOC.brief_summary: The study aimed at identifying whether different expectations have an impact on experiencing emotions in the form of sadness.
DOC.brief_title: The Role of Expectations in Experimentally Induced Sadness
DOC.criteria: fluent in German language major depression current intake of psychotropic medication drug intake within the last two weeks alcohol consumption within the last twelve hours allergic to capsaicin allergic to sesame oil students in medicine, pharmacy, or psychology in their third year or older
